channel.title: Quanta on Funky Cloud Medina
channel.description: Recent content in Quanta on Funky Cloud Medina

item.title: How to restart the BMC on a Quanta server
item.description: If you’ve ever been in a situation where your Quanta BMC is misbehaving and you need to reset it, you may have noticed that the built in CLI for remote management (SMASH) is missing ipmiutil, or at least it was on my machine. To reset the BMC on a Quanta machine, SSH to the out of band IP address of the server. Once you’ve logged in, run show to list the available ‘targets’ for the SMASH CLI.
